level.text: The agency may operate instant games.
Total prize disbursements in the instant game shall be at least forty-five percent (45%) of the gross receipts from the sale of tickets.
The price of an instant game ticket shall be one dollar ($1) or any other price designated by the Executive Director from a price schedule adopted by the Board pursuant to ยง500.1.
